verbs.description: it [V: could] dip to 34 degrees with a freeze watch in lawrence tonight while 8 000-plus columbia gas customers remain without heat state and local officials as well as columbia gas representatives are urging residents affected by the disaster in the merrimack valley to seek alternative housing as temperatures drop wednesday residents can call 1 - 800 - 590 - 5571 for housing help national weather service north andover andover lawrence massachusetts mema leonel rondon columbia gas 34 degrees department of public works greater lawrence christopher markuns columbia lawrence the eagle tribune massachusetts emergency management agency kurt schwartz heat judy rakowsy charlie baker baseball dpw director national oceanic and atmospheric administration andover massachusetts lawrence public schools superintendent merrimack valley gov charlie baker
